short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TackIt! Add Products to your BuildEffective account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BuildEffective's 'TackIt' Chrome extension allows you to save product specifications and documents from Lowe's, HomeDepot, Build.com and LampsPlus in your VirtualProperty. This helps with project planning, shopping, and future maintenance. You can create shopping lists and generate purchase orders, storing the product information for later use in different groups.
